faq.question: Why do I have extra skill points?
answer: If you are playing Ark, Hoyoung, or Adele, you must complete your storyline quests to receive certain skills
faq.tags: sp 4th job ark hoyoung adele cygnus knight

faq.question: Where did Mastery Books go?
answer: Mastery Books were removed in the Destiny Update and are no longer required to reach Master Level for 4th job skills

faq.question: What should I assign my AP into?
answer: Using Auto Assign is completely fine. There are no longer any off-meta ways to assign AP
Pirate Explorers have the option of Auto Assigning STR and DEX, ONLY chose STR for Buccaneers and ONLY DEX for Cosairs
Xenon have the option of Auto Assigning STR,DEX and LUK, all are viable and should be balanced evenly
faq.tags: ap pirate explorer xenon auto assign

faq.question: How should I put my SP? Are there are Skill Builds?
answer: As of November 20, 2019, all classes are able to max all their skills

Characters created prior to this date will need to buy a SP Reset Scroll with mesos from Matilda in Interactive Worlds or Cash Shop in Heroic Worlds. You can also find them in Event Shops if there is one currently around
On guidance for how to allocate your SP, max out Passives first, then Buffs, then Attacks. Prioritize passives that either require few SP to max or provide damage increases

faq.question: When is __ class coming out?
answer: If a class came out in the (November~January) Winter in KMS, expect it to come out (May~July) in the Summer
If a class came out in the (June~August) Summer in KMS, expect it to come out (November~December) in the Winter

faq.question: I cannot drop or sell any items or use Auction House
answer: If your account is newly created or you purchased NX Credit (not prepaid) for the first time on your account, you will receive a 7-day Trade Restriction for security reasons
faq.tags: account drop sell item auction house nx trade restriction cash shop npc

faq.question: What are these floating circles above people's heads
answer: They are from Soul Weapons, you need to defeat a boss and obtain 10 [Soul Shards] to exchange for a random Soul type of that boss. Different Soul types provide different stats, there is also a 'Magnificent' modifier that is different from the rest
You can also get Boss Souls from Gachapon and Marvel Machine which is NX Content

faq.question: What are these floating people behind people's characters
answer: They are from Professions, when you reach the Meister rank in Blacksmithing, Accessory Crafting or Alchemy, you can choose to have a special effect above your character
faq.tags: effect meister profession crafting character angel

faq.question: Why does this item give less range compared to one that seems stronger?
answer: Certain equipment have Set Effect bonuses which you may break by equipping something else
For Kanna, there is a passive that converts MP from items into HP. Additionally, Kanna gains increased Magic Attack based on your Max HP
faq.tags: item equipment set effect range damage kanna

faq.question: Can I have 2 MapleStory clients open on one computer at once?
answer: No, only one client can be opened at a time

faq.question: How do I change to another class on my character?
answer: That is not possible unless you are of the Explorers (Bishop, Shadower, Hero, etc.) class group. If you are part of the Explorers class group, then you can job change to another class as long as it's still within the same job group (ex. Mage, Warrior, Thief). You can pay a Meso fee to your 4th Job Instructor in Leafre

faq.question: I can't find the __ Button/UI on my left-hand side Icons
answer: Certain icons appear after you have reached a certain level so, if you do not see them it is most likely because you are not high enough level
If it is the Giftbox icon you are looking for in GMS, it only appears when you have a gift. If a gift expires, the Giftbox will disappear
Your minimap may also block some of your icons, try moving it if you cannot see certain icons!
faq.tags: icon missing event quest lightbulb giftbox

faq.question: I'm playing this Explorer Pirate class that I thought uses STR, why am I getting more range from DEX??
answer: Explorer Pirate's Link Skill has a togglable effect where you can swap STR + %STR stats into DEX + %DEX and vice versa, DEX + %DEX into STR + %STR. Double clicking the Link Skill in the Link Skill Manager will turn this effect on/off
This effect only applies to the character with the original Link Skill and does not transfer if the Link Skill is applied to another character
faq.tags: pirate explorer range damage dex str link skill

faq.question: Can I delete a Burning character and still get the rewards again?
answer: Yes, equipment such as the Frozen Set and Timed Root Abyss set (for Tera Burning) can be obtained again if you recreate a Burning character
Only additional rewards for reaching Lv. 200 to 220 can only be claimed once per account
faq.tags: burning delete character mega tera rewards recreate

faq.question: How do I get the Main Rewards from the Maple Guide?
answer: The Main Rewards stated in the Maple Guide only show the possible rewards you can obtain from that content and are not guaranteed
The 'Stamp Requirement' objective when completed allows you to teleport freely to that location regardless of level
Without the objective completed, you can only teleport to the location if you are within 29 levels of the maximum recommended level
Maple Guide Rewards found in certain levels can be obtained once per World after completing the objective given
faq.tags: maple guide main rewards stamp cannot get

faq.question: Can I transfer Cash Shop items from one character to another?
answer: Characters that belong to the same Class Group share the same Cash Shop inventories
Items cannot be transferred to characters that do not belong to the same Class Group unless during a 'Cash Shop Transfer' event
Cash Shop Transfer events occur about 2 to 3 times per year and allows items to be moved between characters even if they do not belong to the same Class Group

faq.question: What are Interactive and Heroic Worlds?
answer: In Feb 2024, Non-Reboot Worlds like Bera and Scania were officially categorized as Interactive Worlds. Reboot Worlds were renamed to Kronos, Hyperion, Solis and categorized as Heroic Worlds
The functionality of the servers are unchanged, the only differences now is their names and how they are grouped
faq.tags: reboot regular non-reboot servers worlds interactive heroic

faq.question: What happened to the class Jett?
answer: In Feb 2024, Jett was removed as a playable character. All remaining Jetts were converted to Beginner (Explorers)
faq.tags: jett class missing removed explorer gone delete

faq.question: What happened to the class Beast Tamer?
answer: In May 2024, Beast Tamer was replaced with the new class Lynn. All Beast Tamers were converted to Lynn
faq.tags: beast tamer class missing removed gone lynn delete
